author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 19-year-old college student was arrested on Thursday for abetting the suicide of her college mate at Adirampattinam in Thanjavur district.

Police said Rajkala, who is also the NCC wing Group Captain, had publicly insulted cadet S. Sulochana, a first year BA (Tamil literature) student leading to the latter ending her life on the Republic Day at the private college at Adirampattinam.

After protests by parents and relatives of Sulochana, the police and college administration moved to secure the arrest of Rajkala who was later produced before the Orathanad court that remanded her in judicial custody. Rajkala was then lodged in the Special Prison for Women, Tiruchi.
title: College girl imprisoned
